subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Ryan Howard took live batting practice for the first time since he tore his left Achilles’ tendon while making the final out of the Phillies’ season-ending 1-0 loss to St. Louis last postseason.
snippet: Ryan Howard took live batting practice for the first time since he tore his left Achilles’ tendon while making the final out of the Phillies’ season-ending 1-0 loss to St. Louis last postseason.
